creator: luca.toldo@merck.de
text:
java -jar fop.jar -xml myfile.xml -xsl myfile.xsl -pdf output.pdf
hangs when "writing out PDF" 

java -jar fop.jar -xml myfile.xml -xsl myfile.xsl -txt output.txt
hangs when "writing out TXT" 

java -jar fop.jar -xml myfile.xml -xsl myfile.xsl -awt
works fine (beyond the fact that the SVG image is not scaled ;-<)

creator: keiron@aftexsw.com
text: This is a java problem. It now exits properly.
batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
